thread.title: Jessica Alba’s Instagram Is a Beach Hair Reboot
thread.title_full: Jessica Alba’s Instagram Is a Beach Hair Reboot

title: Jessica Alba’s Instagram Is a Beach Hair Reboot
text: Jessica Alba Shows How to Do Beach Hair, the Hollywood Way February 8, 2017 12:04 AM by Sophie Schulte-Hillen Photo: Getty Images Jessica Alba has rippling year-round beach waves down to an art, thanks in part to the salty SoCal air, but that hardly means that an ocean-inspired hair situation requires proximity to the sea. Spotted on Instagram last night, the actress turned lifestyle entrepreneur credited the curve of a crashing wave for the kind of side-swept, undulating blowout that was the reason why round brushes and salt spray were invented (no coincidence that her Honest hair care line features one tailor-made to her specifications). Loading View on Instagram It’s an impulse that injects a jolt of polished glamour into the traditional textured notion of beach hair—and offers fresh inspiration for those who are counting down the days until their next seaside escape. And who isn’t? With spring just six weeks away, here’s a hairstyle that will tide anyone over until breezy hair gets easy again. In This Story: Jessica Alba Recommended For You
